block.p: Marci Renée Etter and Andrew Howard Stern were married last evening. Rabbi Leora Kaye officiated at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.

Mrs. Stern, 34, is a litigation associate in the New York office of Gibson, Dunn & Crutcher, a Los Angeles law firm. She graduated cum laude from Duke and received her law degree cum laude from the University of Michigan. She is the daughter of Debbie and Jay S. Etter of New York.
Marci Renée Etter and Andrew Howard Stern were married last evening. Rabbi Leora Kaye officiated at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.
Marci Renée Etter and Andrew Howard Stern were married last evening. Rabbi Leora Kaye officiated at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.

Mrs. Stern, 34, is a litigation associate in the New York office of Gibson, Dunn & Crutcher, a Los Angeles law firm. She graduated cum laude from Duke and received her law degree cum laude from the University of Michigan. She is the daughter of Debbie and Jay S. Etter of New York.

Mr. Stern, 35, is the director of corporate development, in New York, for F5 Networks, a computer networking company in Seattle. He graduated cum laude from Princeton and has an M.B.A. from Harvard. He is the son of Phyllis and Richard D. Stern of Paradise Valley, Ariz.
